subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. football rules committee dropped for now a proposal to penalize offenses for snapping the ball before 10 seconds have run off the 40-second play clock.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. football rules committee dropped for now a proposal to penalize offenses for snapping the ball before 10 seconds have run off the 40-second play clock.
